Token * ANN::BiasANNComponent::doForward ( Token *  input,
bool  during_training 
)
virtual

Virtual method that executes the set of operations required for each block of connections when performing the forward step of the Backpropagation algorithm, and returns its output Token

Reimplemented from ANN::ANNComponent.

References AssignRef, bias_vector, bunch_size, Token::convertTo(), doSaxpyLoop(), doScopy(), ERROR_EXIT, ERROR_EXIT2, TokenMemoryBlock::getMemBlock(), ANN::Connections::getPtr(), Token::getTokenCode(), TokenMemoryBlock::getUsedSize(), input, ANN::ANNComponent::input_size, output, ANN::ANNComponent::output_size, table_of_token_codes::token_mem_block, and ANN::ANNComponent::use_cuda.

Referenced by ANN::HyperplaneANNComponent::doForward().
